scripts.bundle: npm run bundle-ios && npm run bundle-android && ./script/install_addon.sh
scripts.bundle-ios: npx bare-pack  --linked --out worklet/app-android.bundle.js worklet/app.mjs --target ios-arm64 --target ios-arm64-simulator --target ios-x64-simulator
scripts.bundle-android: npx bare-pack  --linked --out worklet/app-android.bundle.js worklet/app.mjs --target android-arm64 --target android-ia32 --target android-x64
